landing.title: Fumana Iqela Lakho Lezopolitiko
landing.subtitle: Phendula imibuzo malunga neembono zakho zezopolitiko uze ufumanise ukuba leliphi iqela loMzantsi Afrika elihambelana neenqobo zakho.
landing.privacy: Iimpendulo zakho zigcinwe kwindawo kwaye azikhe zabelwane.

confidence.low: Ukuhambelana okubuthathaka - cinga ngokuphonononga onke amaqela

about.title: Malunga ne-Elekti
about.methodologyText: I-Elekti isebenzisa indlela ebanzi, esekelwe kubungqina ukuthelekisa iimbono zakho zezopolitiko namaqela ezopolitiko aseMzantsi Afrika. Inkqubo yethu yenzelwe ukuba ibe nobulungisa, icace, kwaye ingakhethi cala.
about.howItWorksText: Uphendula imibuzo engama-28 eyakhiwe ngononophelo egubungela iindawo ezinkulu zomgaqo-nkqubo kubandakanywa ukhathalelo lwempilo, imfundo, uqoqosho, ulawulo kunye nemiba yoluntu. Umbuzo ngamnye wenzelwe ukuveza izinto ozikhethayo kwezopolitiko ngaphandle kokuthambekela kwiqela.
about.scoringText: Impendulo nganye oyinikayo ithelekiswa nezikhundla zamaqela ezibhaliweyo ezivela kwiimaniifesto ezisemthethweni, amaxwebhu omgaqo-nkqubo kunye neengxelo zoluntu. Amaqela afumana amanqaku alinganisiweyo ngokusekelwe ekusondelaneni kwezikhundla zawo ezivakalisiweyo neempendulo zakho. La manqaku alinganiswa kwisikali se-0-100, kunye nokufana kwakho okuphezulu kunye nezinye iindlela zichazwe ngokucacileyo. Sikunika nokubeka izinga lokuthembana ukunceda ukuqonda ukuba ukufanelana kwakho kuqinile kangakanani.
about.transparencyText: Zonke izikhundla zamaqela kunye nobunzima bamanqaku zinqunywa ngophando oluqinileyo lwamaxwebhu asemthethweni amaqela. Indlela yethu ivulelekile futhi inokuphononongwa. Asikhethi naliphi na iqela lezopolitiko okanye ingcamango - injongo yethu kuphela kukunceda wenze izigqibo ezinolwazi ezisekelwe kwizinto ozikhethayo kunye nezikhundla ezichazwe ngamaqela.
about.dataSourcesText: Izikhundla zamaqela zicutshungulwa ngononophelo kwiimaniifesto ezisemthethweni zamaqela, amaxwebhu omgaqo-nkqubo, iirekhodi zokuvota zeparamente kunye neengxelo zoluntu eziqinisekisiweyo. Sihlaziya idatha yethu rhoqo ukubonisa utshintsho lomgaqo-nkqubo. Zonke izixhobo zemithombo zivela kumajelo asemthethweni amaqela okanye imibutho yeendaba ehloniphekileyo. Ukuba ukholelwa ukuba naluphi na ulwazi aluchanekanga, samukela izilungiso ngamaxwebhu afanelekileyo.
about.privacyText: Ubumfihlo bakho bubaluleke kakhulu. Sikholelwa ukuba iimbono zakho zezopolitiko ziyimfihlo kwaye zifanele ukhuseleko oluphezulu.
about.noTrackingText: Asisebenzisi amakhukhi, ii-analytics pixels, okanye naluphi na ubuchwepheshe bokulandela. Asikwazi ukubona iimpendulo zakho, asikwazi ukukwazisa, yaye asinayo umdla wokwenza oko. Iimpendulo zakho zemibuzo azithunyelwa kwiiseva zethu.
about.localOnlyText: Yonke into yenzeka kwisikhangeli sakho. Iimpendulo zakho zigcinwe kuphela kwisixhobo sakho kwaye akukho kwenye indawo. Ukuba ususa idatha yesikhangeli sakho, iziphumo zakho ziyaphela ngonaphakade - asinayo backup kuba asikazange sibe nazo ekuqaleni.
about.sharingText: Xa wabelana ngeziphumo, iimpendulo zakho zifakwa ngqo kwikhonkco le-URL ngokwalo. Oku kuthetha ukuba nabani na onelo link angabona iziphumo zakho, kodwa idatha ayithinti iiseva zethu. Ulawula ukuba ngubani obona iziphumo zakho ngokubeka ubani ufumana elo link. Cima i-link, yaye iziphumo zakho zingasese kwakhona.
about.analyticsText: Sisebenzisa iCloudflare Web Analytics, inkonzo ye-analytics egxile kubumfihlo engatoli amakhukhi, engalandeli abantu ngabanye kwiwebhusayithi, yaye engaqokeleli naluphi na ulwazi oluchongwayo lomntu. Isinika iinkcukacha ezidibanisiweyo ezisiseko (njengokujonga iphepha ngokupheleleyo) ukusinceda siqonde ukuba iwebhusayithi iyasetyenziswa, ngaphandle kokonakalisa ubumfihlo bakho. ICloudflare ayikwazi ukubona iimpendulo zakho zemibuzo okanye ukukuchonga ngokwakho.
about.partiesText: Sibandakanya amaqela amakhulu ali-14 ezopolitiko aseMzantsi Afrika amele iimbono ezahlukeneyo kwi-spectrum yezopolitiko. Ukhetho lwethu lusekelwe ekumelweni kweparamente, ukubaluleka konyulo, kunye nokwahluka kweengcamango.
about.disclaimerText: I-Elekti sisixhobo semfundo, hayi indawo yophando. Amaqela ezopolitiko yimibutho entsonkothileyo enezikhundla ezahlukeneyo eziguqukayo ngokuhamba kwexesha. Sikukhuthaza kakhulu ukuba ufunde iimanifesto zamaqela, uzimase iiforam zoluntu, kwaye uqinisekise ulwazi lwethu ngokuzimeleyo. Esi sixhobo sibonisa ulungelelwaniso olusekelwe kwizikhundla ezichaziweyo - ulawulo lokwenyani lunokwahluka. Sebenzisa ezi ziphumo njengesiqalo sokuphonononga nzulu, hayi njengesigqibo sakho sokugqibela.
about.viewDataText: Ngomoya wokucaca ngokupheleleyo, unokuvavanya iifayile zethu zedatha ngokwakho. Ezi fayile zeJSON ziqulethe zonke izikhundla zamaqela, ubunzima bamanqaku, kunye nemetadata yemibuzo esetyenziswe yi-algorithm yethu.

anc.desc: I-African National Congress liqela elilawulayo eMzantsi Afrika, elikhuthaza idemokhrasi yentlalo, utshintsho, kunye nokujongana nokungalingani ngongenelelo lukarhulumenti.

da.desc: I-Democratic Alliance ikhuthaza idemokhrasi yenkululeko, uqoqosho lwemarike yasimahla, kunye nezopolitiko ezingenalo uhlanga ngokugxininisa kulawulo olulungileyo kunye nokudala imisebenzi.

mk.desc: I-uMkhonto we Sizwe Party igxile kutshintsho lwezoqoqosho oluqinile, ikhuthaza uphuhliso oluqhutywa ngurhulumeni kunye nokujongana nobungqina bembali.

eff.desc: I-Economic Freedom Fighters liqela elikwesobunxele kakhulu elikhuthaza utshintsho lwezoqoqosho oluqinile, ukwenziwa kwelizwe kunye nokwabiwa komhlaba ngaphandle kwembuyekezo.

ifp.desc: I-Inkatha Freedom Party ikhuthaza iinqobo zenkcubeko yamaZulu, i-federalism, kunye noqoqosho lwemarike yasimahla ngoxanduva loluntu.

pa.desc: I-Patriotic Alliance igxile ekujongananeni nemiba yokufuduka, ikhuthaza ubuzwe baseMzantsi Afrika, kunye nokubeka phambili iimfuno zabemi.

vfplus.desc: I-Freedom Front Plus imele iimfuno zama-Afrikaner, ikhuthaza i-federalism, amalungelo abancinci, kunye neenqobo ezigcinayo.

actionsa.desc: I-ActionSA liqela elisembindini eligxile kulawulo olusebenzayo, ukulwa urhwaphilizo, kunye nokukhula kwezoqoqosho ngothethathethwano lwecandelo labucala.

acdp.desc: I-African Christian Democratic Party ikhuthaza iinqobo zobuKristu, imigaqo-nkqubo yentlalo egcinayo, kunye nedemokhrasi yomgaqo-siseko.

ufc.desc: I-Unite for Change igxile ekudibaniseni abantu abasezantsi kunye nokujongana neenkxalabo zoluntu lwendawo ngemigaqo-nkqubo eqhubekayo.

sacp.desc: I-South African Communist Party ikhuthaza ubusoshiyali, amalungelo abasebenzi, kunye nenguqu iye kuluntu lobusoshiyali ngolawulo lukarhulumenti.

udm.desc: I-United Democratic Movement ikhuthaza idemokhrasi yentlalo, uxolelwano, kunye nemigaqo-nkqubo esebenzayo yokulwa nentlupheko nokungalingani.

aljamah.desc: I-Al Jama-ah imele iinqobo zamaSilamsi kwaye ikhuthaza ubulungisa bentlalo, ulawulo olunesimilo, kunye namalungelo oluntu olucinezelelweyo.

cope.desc: I-Congress of the People ikhuthaza idemokhrasi yentlalo, ulawulo olulungileyo, kunye nemigaqo-nkqubo yezoqoqosho elinganisa ukukhula nentlalontle yoluntu.

q1.text: Inkqubo yempilo yoluntu exhaswa ngumphakathi (inkqubo ye-National Health Insurance) kufuneka isekwe ukunikeza ukukhathalelwa kwasimahla kubo bonke.

q2.text: Imfundo ephakamileyo kufuneka ibe simahla kubo bonke abafundi (akukho mali), kungekhona nje uncedo lwemali oluhlolwayo.

q3.text: Urhulumeni kufuneka asebenzise isibonelelo-mali esingenammiqathango kubo bonke abemi, nokuba kufuna irhafu ephezulu okanye ukuboleka.

q4.text: Urhulumeni kufuneka atyale kakhulu kwizindlu zikawonke-wonke zeentsapho ezingenayo imali eninzi.

q5.text: Utyalo-mali lwezindlu zikawonke-wonke kufuneka lube yinto ephambili nokuba kufuna ukusika ezinye iinkonzo zikawonke-wonke.

q6.text: Urhulumeni kufuneka anyuse irhafu kubantu abatyebileyo ukuxhasa iinkqubo zoluntu ezandisiweyo (impilo, imfundo kunye nezibonelelo zentlalo).

q7.text: UMzantsi Afrika kufuneka ubeke phambili izivumelwano zorhwebo ezikhusela amashishini asekhaya, nokuba kuthetha amaxabiso aphezulu kubathengi.

q8.text: Ipropati yabucala kunye namalungelo amashishini amancane kufuneka akhuselelwe ngamandla ekuthathweni kunye nomthetho onzima.

q9.text: Urhulumeni kufuneka adale iinkqubo ezinkulu zemisebenzi yoluntu kunye neenkqubo zokuqinisekisa umsebenzi ukunciphisa ukungaqeshwa.

q10.text: Abasebenzi kufuneka babe namalungelo aqinileyo okugweva kunye nokuxoxisana ngqo nabaqeshi ngaphandle kokungenelela kurhulumeni.

q11.text: I-BEE kunye nokwenza ngokulungisa kufuneka kuqhubeke kube ziinkalo eziphambili kurhulumeni ukubuyisela ukungalingani ngokobuhlanga noqoqosho.

q12.text: Ukuthathwa komhlaba wabucala ngaphandle kwembuyekezo yexabiso lemarike kufuneka kuvunyelwe phantsi komthetho ukukhawulezisa uhlaziyo lomhlaba.

q13.text: Uphuhliso lwamaphandle kunye nenkxaso yezolimo (kubandakanywa iinkxaso-mali kunye neziseko zeengqalasizinda zabalimi abancinci) kufuneka ifumane inkxaso-mali enkulu kurhulumeni.

q14.text: Ilizwe kufuneka libeke phambili utyalo-mali kumandla ahlaziyekayo (ilanga, umoya) kunokwandisa amandla amalahle.

q16.text: UMgaqo-siseko kufuneka uhlengahlengiswe apho kuyimfuneko ukukhawulezisa utshintsho kunye nokuvumela ulwabiwo oluqhubekayo.

q17.text: Inyathelo elinamandla lokulwa urhwaphilizo (nokuba liphazamisa iinkokeli zangoku) libaluleke ngaphezu kokugcina uzinzo lwezopolitiko.

q18.text: Ukuzimela kwezobulungisa kunye namagunya okuphekelela kufuneka kukhuselelwe ngokungqongqo, nokuba oko kunciphisa ukuguquguquka kwesigqeba.

q21.text: Ukunciphisa ulwaphulo-mthetho, urhulumeni kufuneka agxile kwisohlwayo esinamandla kunokujongana nezizathu zentlalo ezifana nobuhlwempu.

q22.text: Abafuduki abangekho emthethweni kufuneka bagxothwe kwaye kulawulwe imida eqinileyo ukukhusela imisebenzi kunye nezibonelelo zasekhaya.

q23.text: Urhulumeni kufuneka aqinise ukukhuselwa komthetho kwabantu be-LGBTQ+ kwaye aqhubele phambili amalungelo alinganayo oluntu.

q15.text: Urhulumente kufuneka atyale imali ngokukhawuleza ekulungiseni iziseko zamanzi nezococeko (iimbombo, amaziko okuhlanza) koomasipala abangaphumeleliyo.

q19.text: uMzantsi Afrika ufuna uhlaziyo oluqinileyo lokuthinjwa korhulumente, kubandakanya ulawulo oluqinileyo kwinkxaso-mali yamaqela ezopolitiko kunye nempembelelo yenkampani kurhulumente.

q20.text: Amaphondo noomasipala kufuneka babe namandla angakumbi nokulawula uhlahlo-lwabiwo mali, nokuba oko kuthetha ukunciphisa igunya likaRhulumente weSizwe.

q24.text: Imikhwa yoqobo kunye neemfundiso kufuneka zibe nefuthe elikhulu ekumiselweni kwemithetho kunye nomgaqo-nkqubo karhulumente.

q25.text: uMzantsi Afrika kufuneka aqaphele ngokusesikweni kwaye axhase izakhiwo zobunkokeli bemveli (iinkosi nookumkani) njengenxalenye yolawulo.

q26.text: Urhulumente kufuneka anike inkxaso-mali eninzi kunye nenkxaso yeelwimi zemveli kwimfundo, kumajelo eendaba nakwiinkonzo zoluntu.

q27.text: uMzantsi Afrika kufuneka ubeke phambili intsebenziswano yezodiplomasi kunye norhwebo olubanzi (kunye ne-EU, i-US kunye nabamelwane base-Afrika) kunokuhambelana namaqela ezopolitiko angaphandle.

q28.text: Urhulumente kufuneka andise amandla okubeka esweni kunye nokufikelela kwidatha yabasemthethweni ukulwa nolwaphulo-mthetho kunye nobunqolobi, nokuba kunciphisa ubumfihlo.

q29.text: Abortion should be legal, publicly funded where necessary, and available on request.

q30.text: The state should prioritise keeping key public utilities (power, water, rail) in public ownership rather than selling them to private firms.

q31.text: The government should actively fund and protect Afrikaans language education and cultural programmes.

q32.text: Government should make active legal and practical accommodations for religious minorities, including Muslim practices and holidays.

q33.text: The government should introduce specific legal protections and targeted support to preserve the rights and cultures of national minorities.

q34.text: The government should prioritise paying down public debt and ensuring fiscal sustainability even if it limits new social spending.

q35.text: Immigration policy should be significantly tightened including stronger border controls and stricter vetting.
